question: Can I pray Namaz with shirt having a picture of Camel or some other animal?
answer:
QUESTION
There is a shirt on which a small camel has been made. Can I say Namaz or recite Quran with wearing that shirt or some other shirt on which an animal's picture is on it.
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to wear clothes having pictures of animate (camel,
etc.) on them. Salaat with such clothes will be Makrooh (reprehensible).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
